isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - MODULAR CONTROL VALVE (MV-3) - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: Once each year or every 100,000 miles (160,000 km), the modular control valve should be disassembled and thoroughly cleaned. Replace all unserviceable components with those supplied with the repair kit.
Lubricate all components with Fleetrite EP2 Moly grease or equivalent to NLGI #2 multi-purpose lithium grease.
